That is why I am not going to argue with you since you are just a resentful monkey who has invented an imaginary enemy. Someone who has bothered with my words. And just to add: I have nothing against these NTR stories, it just seems strange to me that you guys theorized about a somewhat predictable plot that does not escape the hentai logic with women «in love» (note the quotes) with their Fukcboys. @Minminasuza gave me a reason, a healthy comment 🙂 unlike @unified-monkey who seems to jump out of his seat for saying something so obvious in this story. It's sad that @Minminasuza deleted his/her comment, because he/she gave a reason to theorize this story.

@unified123 (...) only the Fuckboys can put their conditions. We already saw that submission with Yumiko being an accomplice in the plan to drug Ayumi, who has now become another bitch after she was drugged. Love? I would rather say a sexual dependence on the pleasure that the president gives him. That's the «love» in these NTR stories in general. Is difficulty understand this, NTR's noob?

@unified123 What you  say just proves my point. Everything you say only makes sense in the very logic of the series. There is no real reason outside of H logic that supports such actions in history, because it is simply fiction. That is the only thing I have been saying from previous comments and, therefore, it seems strange to me that they talk a lot about the plot of this story when it is something predictable. @Minminasuza gave a reason why he theorized, taking into account that it is a story that is based on hentai logic. From this logic alone, it would make sense for Ayumi to accept the cock in the act of rape, and then accept it again simply because it is «repressed». It doesn't matter if they drugged her or not, she will accept it because her repression outweighs her common sense. And yes, the women are «broken»: both Ayumi and Yumiko are at the point of NO RETURN and will clearly OBEY everything the Fuckboys say: the women can't put conditions on their relationship.

How strange that I did not find the comment of @Minminazusa, who gave me the reason about the hentai logic behind this story, but at the same time gave me a reason why @Minminasuza theorized about this story. Looks like he deleted his comment. What a pity. :(

@SchrodingerZ you are seriously fkn stupid 😂😂 Yumiko clearly loves the chairman. Ayumi is just simply having an affair because her own husband hasnt fucked her for over a year.

She also wanted to fuck the chairman because she was jealous of Yumiko getting fucked by such a big cock and wanted to try it herself. 

There is no mind break , they simply love the sex they provide.

You take history too seriously, folks. There is not much to say in a story where the plot is to turn women into whores, not even lovers. It is simple. First, Yumiko became the old man's bitch (by the power of the cock) and was an accessory to the rape of the other girl. Now the other girl is the new bitch (only one night and drugs is enough). That's what it's all about: in the end the plot forces them to be bitches who live for Fuckboy's cock. Girls in love? That doesn't exist here, folks. That's why I don't understand why they keep arguing, since both girls are already "broken" (mind break) and they obey their Fuckboys in everything.

The black page is preview for the next (final) volume, it has random quote; without context could just be the author playing literary tricks as we're not really sure about the situation and who said what. | Some interesting things, but could be my misinterpretation: Nagata invited Yumiko to her room, but he also told her he had promised Kaidou (chairman) he won't touch her, so she could turn down the invite. The interesting part is later: 1) Shinozuka (Ayumi, or her husband) step out of the neighbourhood council and there's word saying "see you in the court". 2) Ayumi probably had sex with Hiro (Yumiko's husband) and thought she must lost her mind to be entranced by that old man's dick. She confront Yumiko on why she cheat a husband who loves her so much, and suggested they just swap husband; love before dick. Not going to put much hope, but pulling such move is brave for the author. Ntr niche doesn't seem to come for that kind of twist.

@randompusssda: Last page of the story, Nagata woke up and surprised there are people sleeping next to him (he went to sleep earlier). Ayumi and the president are wasted, so they're not waking up any time soon. Yumiko who woke up earlier said it's noon already. The white author message page is just him thanking his supporters in Fantia.
I don't want to see the new guy fuck her arfter the Chairman put all the work into mindbreaking. Wish they had just kept it with him and the two of them.
